item.description:
Please join us for an introduction to creative fabric recycling!

What do you with a favorite wool sweater that the moths have enjoyed too? Felt it and make it into something new and funky! What about that favorite shirt with the mustard stain? And the slacks that have seen better days?

Using basic sewing techniques and a bit of creativity we'll learn how to turn a worn out wardrobe into attractive and useful new items. All skill levels are welcome!

The loose agenda:
1:00- Meet and greet
1:15- Start cutting, sewing and felting the fabrics
3:30- Wrap up

Please bring a light snack to share with the group.

There is a $5 fee to cover materials and meetup costs.
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the front door and we'll let you in
item.name: Recycled Fabric Creations
